title: Roast pork fillet with apple sherry sauce
ingredients: ['2 whole pork fillets', '1/8 teaspoon mustard powder', '1/8 teaspoon dried thyme', '100ml (4 fl oz) dry sherry', '100ml (4 fl oz) soy sauce', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons fresh root ginger, minced', '250g (9 oz) Bramley apple sauce', '2 tablespoons dry sherry', '1 tablespoon soy sauce']
